languages.text: {n}Зрачки Кассии испуганно расширяются. Просверлив взглядом кубок, девушка зажмуривается и залпом опустошает его.{/n} "Горло, кх-х… в огне…"
{n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."
languages.original_text: {n}Зрачки Кассии испуганно расширяются. Просверлив взглядом кубок, девушка зажмуривается и залпом опустошает его.{/n} "Горло, кх-х… в огне…"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia's pupils widen in dismay. The young woman stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs it in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is — cough — on fire..."

{n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅诧异地瞪大了眼睛。她目不转睛地盯着酒杯，随后眯起眼睛，一饮而尽。{/n}“我的喉咙……烧起来了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅诧异地瞪大了眼睛。她目不转睛地盯着酒杯，随后眯起眼睛，一饮而尽。{/n}“我的喉咙……烧起来了……”

languages.text: {n}カシアの目が、動揺と困惑に大きく見開かれた。彼女はじっと杯を見つめたあと、目をぎゅっとつぶり、中身を一気に飲み干した。{/n}「喉が…燃えています…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの目が、動揺と困惑に大きく見開かれた。彼女はじっと杯を見つめたあと、目をぎゅっとつぶり、中身を一気に飲み干した。{/n}「喉が…燃えています…」

languages.text: {n}Cassia abre los ojos de par en par, asustada. Fija la mirada en la copa, luego arruga el entrecejo y se bebe el contenido de un solo trago.{/n} «Me... me quema la garganta...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia abre los ojos de par en par, asustada. Fija la mirada en la copa, luego arruga el entrecejo y se bebe el contenido de un solo trago.{/n} «Me... me quema la garganta...».

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın gözleri dehşetle büyüyor. Kadehe dikkatle bakıp sonra gözlerini kısıyor ve içindekileri tek yudumda bitiriyor.{/n} "Boğazım... Yanıyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın gözleri dehşetle büyüyor. Kadehe dikkatle bakıp sonra gözlerini kısıyor ve içindekileri tek yudumda bitiriyor.{/n} "Boğazım... Yanıyor..."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Cassia s'écarquillent de consternation. Elle fixe intensément la coupe, puis plisse les yeux et vide son contenu d'un trait.{/n} « Ça me... brûle la gorge... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Cassia s'écarquillent de consternation. Elle fixe intensément la coupe, puis plisse les yeux et vide son contenu d'un trait.{/n} « Ça me... brûle la gorge... »

languages.text: {n}Cassias Augen weiten sich bestürzt. Sie starrt auf den Becher, verdreht die Augen und trinkt ihn mit einem beherzten Schluck aus.{/n} "Meine Kehle ... brennt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's eyes widen in dismay. She stares intently at the cup, then screws up her eyes and downs the contents in one gulp.{/n} "My throat is... on fire..."
